name: Alternating Push-Up
description: The Alternating Push-Up focuses on strengthening the chest area. The hand placement of the alternating push-up is a bit different from a regular push-up. This is a variation of the push-up meant for fitness goers who want to extend their workout routine.
focuses: Get into push-up position, with your body straight, toes on the floor, and hands on the floor slightly wider than shoulder width apart with arms fully extended
Keeping your shoulders square to the floor, and your left arm above your shoulder and rest your right hand near your waist side
Inhale as you lower your body towards the ground by bending at the elbows
Exhale as you push your body back up, than switch your hand placement, so your right hand is now over your shoulder and left hand by your waist side
Keep alternating sides to complete all reps
